mapper.select: select store_idx, Sum(amount) as amount, count(*) as user_idx from inicis where status in (0, 2) and (pay_date between TO_DATE(#{date},'YYYY-MM-DD') and LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(#{date},'YYYY-MM-DD')) ) group by store_idx order by amount desc

select store_idx, Sum(amount) as amount2, count(*) as user_idx from kakaopayapproval where status in(0, 2) and (approved_at between TO_DATE(#{date},'YYYY-MM-DD') and LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(#{date},'YYYY-MM-DD')) ) group by store_idx order by amount2 desc
select store_name from store where store_idx = #{storeIdx}
select user_mbti, count(user_mbti) as user_status from member group by user_mbti order by user_status desc
